no_events.title: No events yet
no_events.description: Create your first event and start selling tickets to your audience

action_center.title: Needs Attention
action_center.no_action_items: No action items need your attention right now.
action_center.draft_description: Publish your events to start selling tickets
action_center.no_sales_description: These events start within 7 days with no sales yet

payouts.not_setup_description: Connect your bank account to receive payments
payouts.ready_description: Your account is set up and ready to receive payments
payouts.processing_time: Payouts are processed within 2-5 business days

next_event.no_upcoming_desc: Create your next event to see it here

events_page.search_placeholder: Search events by title, location, category...

event_card_detail.add_ticket_tier: Add at least one ticket tier

scan.title: Scan Tickets
scan.subtitle: Fast and secure ticket validation for your events
scan.qr_code_label: QR Code Data or Ticket ID
scan.qr_placeholder: Paste QR code data here (e.g., ticket:abc123|event:xyz456)
scan.invalid_format: Invalid QR code format. Expected format: ticket:[id]|event:[id]
scan.invalid_ticket: Invalid ticket. This ticket does not exist.
scan.ticket_mismatch: Ticket/Event mismatch. This ticket is for a different event.
scan.unauthorized: Unauthorized. You are not the organizer of this event.
scan.already_used: Ticket already used. This ticket was scanned previously.
scan.cancelled: Ticket cancelled. This ticket has been cancelled.
scan.valid_ticket_guest: Valid ticket! (Demo mode - ticket not actually marked as used)

payouts_page.title: Payouts
payouts_page.subtitle: Manage your earnings and withdrawal requests
payouts_page.processed_friday: Payouts are processed every Friday at 5:00 PM
payouts_page.no_payouts_desc: Your payout history will appear here once you start receiving payments.
payouts_page.request_success: Payout request submitted successfully! We will process it on the next scheduled date.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your organizer account
settings.profile_desc: Manage your name, email, and contact information
settings.organization_brand_desc: Business name, logo, and social links

payout_settings.title: Payout Settings
payout_settings.subtitle: Manage how you receive payments from your events. Set up your payout method, track your balance, and view transaction history.
payout_settings.no_method_desc: Add your bank account or mobile money details to receive payouts from your events.
payout_settings.no_history_desc: Your payout history will appear here once you start receiving payments from your events.
payout_settings.payout_scheduled: Your payout will be scheduled for the next Friday at 5:00 PM
payout_settings.complete_verification: Complete verification steps below to activate payouts.
payout_settings.verification_issues_desc: Some verification steps failed. Please retry or contact support for assistance.
payout_settings.why_verification_desc: We verify your identity and payment details to protect you and comply with financial regulations. All information is encrypted and secure.
payout_settings.platform_fee_haiti: Charged on each ticket sale. Includes payment processing, hosting, and platform features.
payout_settings.platform_fee_abroad: Higher fee for international accounts. Includes payment processing, hosting, and platform features.
payout_settings.processing_fee_desc: Charged by payment processor on each transaction. Deducted before payout.
payout_settings.note_desc: Fees vary based on payment method and location. International accounts have higher fees due to cross-border processing costs. Refunds are deducted from your next payout. Contact support for questions about specific transactions or fee structures.
payout_settings.status_not_setup_desc: Complete your payout setup to start receiving your earnings. This only takes a few minutes.
payout_settings.status_pending_desc: We're reviewing your payout information. This usually takes 1-2 business days.
payout_settings.status_active_desc: Your payout account is active and ready to receive payments.
payout_settings.status_hold_desc: There's an issue with your payout account. Please contact support to resolve this.
